name: farl

a thin bread from Ireland made from oat or wheat flour, often in the shape of a triangle: soda farl Ladle the soup into bowls and serve with soda farls.potato farl Potato farls are cooked in meat fat to make them crispy.
More examplesFewer examplesWe had a huge breakfast of egg, sausage, and fried potato farls.The loaf is cut into farls before it is baked.These griddle-baked soda farls are delicious served warm with butter. Traditionally, farls were cooked on hot griddles over an open fire.The circle of dough was marked into farls and baked.
